name: You need to confirm your joint application (happy path)
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

Your ((partner)) reviewed the information you entered and provided some of their own information. Now you need to confirm((paysFees?? and pay for)) your joint application.

Confirm((paysFees?? and pay for)) your application: ((signin url))

Your application will not be submitted until you have confirmed((paysFees?? and paid for)) it.

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: ((isReminder??Reminder: ))Action required : you need to confirm((paysFees?? and pay for)) your joint ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
